price: Basi walipo kuja wachawi, Musa aliwaambia: Tupeni mnavyo tupa!
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ
footnotes: Walipo hudhuria wachawi, na wakasimama mbele ya Musa kupambana naye kwa uchawi wao mbele ya watu, Musa aliwaambia: Leteni huo uchawi mlio nao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
